h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone
content: As an added bonus, if you keep hassling the Man-in-Stone, he’ll promise to prepare wares to sell the next time you visit. Be sure to take him up on this offer, as he’ll have a decent selection of (very high-priced) goods!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
As an added bonus, if you keep hassling the Man-in-Stone, he’ll promise to prepare wares to sell the next time you visit. Be sure to take him up on this offer, as he’ll have a decent selection of (very high-priced) goods!
